website_summaries.verdict: The strap on this arm blaster stays steady for up to 70 lb. of weight. More than that, and you'll need to readjust when it slips.
pros: Padded abdomen, elbow, and neck pads
Adjustable belt made of heavy-duty webbed nylon
Double rivets to secure nylon strap
Comfortable unless your core isn't strong
cons: Straps may start sliding as your weights approach 70 lb., so plan on adjusting when you hit that level

customer_reviews.title: I felt a difference the first day!!
customer_reviews.text: I kid you not, if you suck at perfect curls, buy this!! Holy crap!! My arms feel great! I didn’t realize how much I wasn’t isolating my biceps. The strap does feel a little cheap, but other than that, it’s a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have Ehlers-Danlos syndrome hypermobility type, so working out is a huge chore because my joints dislocate and my tendons and ligaments are loose. This thing is amazing to combat the constant shoulder and elbow dislocations, and sets my arms at an angle which works 75% more of my arm musculature and worked muscles I wasn't aware were even being missed! I think it's a great addition to my arsenal of workout tools. Recommend for everyone for the simple fact that it completely changes what muscles are worked. Regular can work for a different muscle set and this enhances the effects.
customer_reviews.author: Lycantis

customer_reviews.title: The Cannon Curl is by far one of the best products. I just received it this week and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Cannon Curl is by far one of the best products. I just received it this week and as soon as I tried them I was impressed. You really feel the burn as you are doing arm curls as the cannon curl keeps good proper form. As a trainer I try lots of equipment but since I first purchased core prodigy products two years ago I’ve been hooked. I am able to create so many different workouts that my clients and myself get to enjoy and see results. I highly recommend all Core Prodigy products.
customer_reviews.author: Mquiroz

customer_reviews.title: Arnold's Secret
customer_reviews.text: I remember seeing Arnold using something like this online. I'm assuming if you're looking at this item you're into bodybuilding and we all know isolating the biceps is not always so easy. Well I can honestly say this cannon curl gave my arms an intense workout and it hit my biceps like no other. I will continue to use it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hec

customer_reviews.title: ... and nobody seems to have come up with a better way to attach it to you body
customer_reviews.text: I'll give it 4 stars because it does work however I think its kinda strange that these have been out forever now and nobody seems to have come up with a better way to attach it to you body.The neck strap is a pain unless you keep it real lose and lock the blaster into place with you elbows prior to picking up the weight.Also people come in a variety of sizes so the "One size fits all" design should be rethought..While its not perfect it works very effectively..
customer_reviews.author: Motorhed

customer_reviews.title: Cannon Curl design department should be fired for skimping out on the strap
customer_reviews.text: The arm piece is well manufactured. However, the strap that goes around your neck is made of the thinnest cheapest webbing with a foam neck pad that ripped off on my second use. Also, the cinch clips DO NOT hold the adjustment and as you curl, the strap will slide through the cinch clips. I don't even use it anymore because of the neck strap digging into my neck and the adjustment will not hold. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this support
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this support. You will get a much better arm workout because your targeting the muscle and prevents you from en proper movement. I seen a increase in strength and size within one month. I have read that these products are uncomfortable but that is not the case. If you do not have a strong core this may put extra strain on you lower back but if you are in good shape that will not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Get your cannon(s) today!
customer_reviews.text: This isolator for the biceps is awesome. For me, at first, it felt awkward having my arms locked in place. But hey, that is what i bought it for. I have noticed vast improvement in the guns. Thick gauge steel with padding for stomach and both elbow areas. Getting the strap set for my individual body was the only setup needed. No pain, no gain babeeeee!
customer_reviews.author: Arden James

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered on time. The product is great. Feels sturdy and is well put together. The cushions don't seem like much at a glance but they are really soft and are effective in reducing discomfort in high friction areas like your neck (neck strap) and elbows. Must be great material. Not paid to say this. Just a happy customer. Would buy again/recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MovieMan312

customer_reviews.title: Popular
customer_reviews.text: Own a gym, and the day we added this it got a good amout of use. A good low cost piece to add some varirty to your free weight section. Discourages most "cheating" techniquesfor instant form improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Kandi S.

customer_reviews.title: Blast Away
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very durable. I have had no issues with it. The only R & D tweak I would make on it..is a better neck pad on the back of the strap for comfort. Other than that I am glad I purchased this product and my biceps love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device!!
customer_reviews.text: "Excellent product!! I’m 52 and work out every day. I had used a similar device years ago as a teenager and really liked the results I got from it. This product is not only superior to the one I used years ago but brings back a lot of memories of friends I use to work out with. I highly recommend this device to anyone serious about body building!!!"
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lostracco

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for arms workout.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent support for are workout. Light in weight and strap is also gives pretty good support during workout. I would definitely recommend this product and price is also pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Sharan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job marginally well
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how long this will last. I've used this type of support in the gyms and this model is very flimsy. The strap is very skinny and the back of the neck pad is very flimsy. The whole thing may be better sized for a child than someone who lifts regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Pen

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, just doesn’t replace a preacher bench
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really perform how I thought it would. No issue with quality or durability of the product. Just doesn’t really work to replace a preacher curl bench. You have to get it tucked up under your armpits otherwise it will put strain on your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: One more thing! This one has the padding so that you wont chaff or cut yourself!
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to use, just as advertised, less than difficult to adjust, perfect "Arm Day" companion. Keep your form and easily adjust the neck strap with the flick of a wrist. This is perfect for keeping form, the easy way.
customer_reviews.author: Squatch

customer_reviews.title: Support works very well. Isolation is certainly key and ...
customer_reviews.text: Support works very well. Isolation is certainly key and is very simple to use. A bit more balance is required when using dumbbells yet still manageable. Item also aids in increasing weight on forward and reverse curls.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos B.

customer_reviews.title: It's got the padding for the back of the neck ...
customer_reviews.text: It's got the padding for the back of the neck that most. Of their competitors do not have. Worth a buy if you want armblaster. I'm approx 245-250 18.5inch arms so I feel a tad big for this but it works fine. Doesn't feel too small. Great iso for biceps.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for my curls. I don't use it as much anymore because I've developed tennis elbow. But before that I used it every time i curl. And I will use it again once my tennis elbow heals.

customer_reviews.text: I've always struggled with building my biceps, but with the Cannon Curl I can feel them growing with each rep! It helps to keep proper form and isolates the biceps. With continued use, I hope to finally increase my bicep size.

product_meta.title: Cannon Curl - Arm and Bicep Support/Arm Blaster
feature_bullets: BICEPS - The Cannon Curl perfectly supports your elbows and enables you to keep the correct posture during curls. Our design properly mimics using a preacher curl system and prevents users from "cheating" during bicep curls. Users immediately notice proper bicep isolation when curling with the Cannon Curl Arm Blaster.
COMFORTABLE - This tough bicep support now has a padded abdomen region in addition to elbow and neck pads (now thicker) for comfort, support, and stability.

STRONG - There is no comparison as to the strongest arm blaster on the market. Constructed of thick gauge aluminum. Stack on the weight on your curl bar or dumbbells and have no worry about our arm blaster bending.

SUPPORT - The Cannon Curl's adjustable belt is made of heavy duty webbed nylon. The neck pad is made of thick neoprene. Double brass rivets are used to properly secure nylon strap. Now made with thicker gauge aluminum to support higher weight levels. Our arm blaster also has a padding for the abdomen.
TRUSTED - Core Prodigy designs and manufactures high quality fitness equipment that you can rely on.
